## Definition of Done

- [ ] I followed AGENTS.md rules (no secrets, no network in tests).
- [ ] I ran relevant checks (ruff, mypy, pytest) or explained why not.
- [ ] I added/updated tests for behavior changes.
- [ ] I updated docs for API/workflow changes.
- [ ] I kept the PR focused and small.
- [ ] I used Conventional Commits for the title.
